canceled.description: Indicates if this vesting allo has been canceled

total_amount.description: Total number of tokens tokens allocated to this account

withdrawn_amount.description: Number of tokens tokens that have been withdrawn by the beneficiary

cliff.description: Number of seconds starting UST during which no token will be vested/unlocked

duration.description: Number of seconds taken by tokens to be fully vested

start_time.description: Timestamp of when vesting is to be started
